name: Rencana Pengajuan Anggaran Non Proyek
query:
SELECT "Kas Bon Non Proyek" typedoc, CONCAT("", fpe.name, "") name, CONCAT(COALESCE(e.first_name, fpe.owner), " - ", fpe.department) peminta, fpe.total_budget, fpe.type, CASE WHEN fpe.type = "Piutang Karyawan" THEN fpe.employee_name WHEN fpe.type = "Operasional Kantor" THEN "Kantor" ELSE fpe.party END party, CASE WHEN fpe.docstatus = 0 THEN "

Not Approved

" WHEN fpe.docstatus = 1 THEN "

Approved

" ELSE "" END docstatus, fpe.purpose, pe.paid_amount paid_amount, fpe.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) outstanding_amount, CASE WHEN fpe.total_budget-COALESCE(pe.paid_amount, 0) > 0 THEN "

Belum Lunas

" ELSE "

Lunas

" END status FROM `tabForm Payment Entry` fpe LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON e.user_id = fpe.owner LEFT JOIN (SELECT form_payment_entry, SUM(paid_amount) paid_amount FROM `tabPayment Entry` WHERE docstatus = 1 and project is null GROUP BY form_payment_entry) pe ON pe.form_payment_entry = fpe.name WHERE fpe.required_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s AND fpe.docstatus IN (0, 1);
